imagePrompt: A poignant medium shot in the distinctive claymation art style, capturing 后羿 (Hou Yi)'s deep sorrow. He is the robust male figure, standing alone in an open courtyard, gazing upwards with profound longing. His posture is one of immense grief and despair, head tilted towards the sky, his hands outstretched slightly in a gesture of yearning. Above him, a magnificent, full clay moon glows softly in the night sky. In the foreground, on a small, intricately sculpted clay altar or table, are various offerings: meticulously crafted clay representations of mooncakes and fruits, arranged with care. The moonlight casts gentle, long shadows, emphasizing his solitude and sorrow. The atmosphere is one of profound sadness, unwavering devotion, and a quiet, enduring longing.
